text:
Say we have an email with an image and three paragraphs of text. I'd like to have two lists of contacts receive this email, yet those on List A only see the image and the first paragraph, while List B sees everything. Essentially wrapping the last two paragraphs in some sort of
`{% if condition %}`
Hi. I'm trying to this code for change og:image

`{% set first =    request.query_dict.f  %}`
`{% set last =     request.query_dict.l  %}`
`{% set company =  request.query_dict.c  %}`

`<meta property="og:image"` 
      `content="<https://img.hyperise.io/i/pLw2Co3Rb.png?business_name=>{{ company }}&first_name={{ first }}&last_name={{ last }}" />`
`<meta property="og:description" content="">`
`<meta property="og:title" content="{{first}} {{last}} - Marketer of the year">`
But it's showing blank for {{first}}, {{last}}, {{company}} on fb
Anyone knows reason ? thanks for reply
I added this code into page setting - additional code snippets section
